intro: Psychotria brachybotrya, commonly known as the dwarf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It is often found in shaded, humid environments within the understory of tropical forests. Psychotria brachybotrya is also noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
